item.title: MIUI OS3.0.3.0.WOZINXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 7 / POCO Pad X1 India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 7 / POCO Pad X1 India

Codename: uke

Version: OS3.0.3.0.WOZINXM | 16.0

Size: 7.1 GB

MD5: 26811274ada3476c5a83ac25c8ef4a5b

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Updated the security patch to November 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS3.0.8.0.WOZMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 7 / POCO Pad X1 Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 7 / POCO Pad X1 Global

Codename: uke

Version: OS3.0.8.0.WOZMIXM | 16.0

Size: 8.2 GB

MD5: cdf86a5b806408712ddfbc63d762342a

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Camera stability
Fix: Volume couldn't be adjusted for multiple apps in some cases
Fix: Split screen wasn't displayed correctly with some third party apps
Updated the security patch to January 2026. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
Fix: Home screen flashed after unlocking in some cases
[Recents]
Fix: Cards occasionally disappeared from Recents in Split screen
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Status bar colors weren't displayed correctly in some cases

Download: Here
